title: Chat Ban
body: I get Chat banned for chirping my own friend in game and we are just having fun going at it together i get banned? like i never flame people i try being a nice respectful player and let people just do bad. but the game i do because my team is just absolute garbage, i get banned instantly like why dont i get award after every game that i dont flame people after they ruin and lose the game for me.

replies.body:
You shouldn't say things in public as others will find it not as funny as you and your friend would.

Riot stated, "Play at your own expense not others". You must have said something really over the edge which 

Private chat is there for a reason, use it. Skype or Discord.


"like i never flame people i try being a nice respectful player and let people just do bad. but the game i do because my team is just absolute garbage, " your attitude like that is consider bad and I am sure we're not seeing the full picture here.

Yeah why don't you and your friend go into a police station and talk about all the glorified stuff, death and killing not stating it is a game to the police officers. I bet they'd think you two are psychopaths/serial killers.

Hence if you have the option in-game to private chat... DO SO... /r /msg "your non loser friend's name here"...

It's so simple.

What is funny/jokes to you and your friend ISN'T and LIKELY won't be funny/a joke to others WHOM aren't your friends...

Nuff said.
